jump_scares.spoiler: A blue light appears in the fireplace out of nowhere and makes a loud sound
A glowing white figure appears in the camera, which startles Mike

movies.title: A Girl Walks Home Alone at Night

jump_scares.spoiler: The handcuffed patient lunges forward in the bed
A sudden bang on the window startles Manuel and Altair
Manuel turns around with the camera, and Altair is standing right in front of him
Manuel turns the camera down from the ceiling and spots Altair standing in front of him with her back turned
While unresponsively sitting on a chair and looking down, Altair suddenly grabs the camera as Manuel points it at her
A door suddenly slams shut on its own
While lying on the floor, Altair suddenly springs upwards and begins to scream
The ceiling lamp suddenly explodes
While Altair plays with something bloody in her hands, an inhuman hand suddenly reaches and grabs her
During a dream, Tricia approaches her husband who has his back turned to her. He suddenly turns around and is shown to be missing his eyes
Tricia suddenly has a vision of her husband as she closes the door
While lying in bed, Tricia has a vision of her husband kneeling over her
Tricia sees her husband standing behind the lawyer
While meditating, Tricia hallucinates that her husband is beside her whispering in her ear
There is a strange chirping noise in the room next to Daniel and Callie, seconds later a large insect like creature crawls past
As Callie investigates the bathroom, something comes out from behind the shower curtain and the screen goes black
The insectoid briefly appears out of the darkness before the screen goes black again
A dog runs towards Darrin
Darrin turns the camera and is startled by Raid
Darrin is startled by a water stream
A loud bang
A dog starts barking at the fence as Clare and Andi walk by
A shadowy figure passes the window behind James and the camera footage cuts out
An image of James with a disfigured face briefly flashes across the camera footage
A loud bang in an otherwise quiet scene may startle some people
Anne shines the torch on a figure standing in the darkness
An invisible force appears to drag Patient 11 away
Patient 11 suddenly screams and pounds on the observation window
Anne sees a mysterious figure standing by the window
There is a loud bang followed by screaming
Anne shines the torch on Callie who now has black eyes and is vomiting a red liquid
Patient 14 begins to scream and shake violently
Patient 14 suddenly appears in front of the scientist
Anne looks in the car mirror and sees Thomas’s face has turned a red color
A hand grabs Anne around the ankle as she walks up the stairs
Thomas wakes up in the back seat and yells which startles Anne
A researcher gets an electric shock
The corpse on the examination table suddenly screams and grabs the researcher around the neck
Anne looks into a hole built into the wall and a pale face with hollow eyes suddenly appears
Anne looks down a corridor and sees an alien figure coming towards her
Something begins to bang on the door
A hand with long fingers suddenly appears on the locker that Anne is hiding in
Anne turns around and sees a grotesque figure standing beside her
Anne turns around and sees her friends face has the same black eyes and deformed expression as previous victims
As the man reaches into the water to touch the parasite, it jumps onto him
A parasite walks onto the security camera and shrieks
Accompanied by a loud sound effect, the camera quickly pans to show Peeping Tom’s feet stepping in front of Feldman
As Feldman looks up, Peeping Tom suddenly jumps up right in front of the camera

movies.title: Butcher, Baker, Nightmare Maker / Night Warning

jump_scares.spoiler: Julia jumps out at Billy from behind a hallway and snaps a photo with her camera
A balloon suddenly explodes
As Detective Carlson enters the kitchen, Aunt Cheryl jumps out at him from the side
While walking away from the house, Julia is grabbed by the detective hiding behind some bushes
Aunt Cheryl runs into the kitchen shouting from the porch door while Julia is looking around
As Margie looks around, there is a cut to Aunt Cheryl watching her from the bushes
Aunt Cheryl suddenly jumps back up from the ground behind Billy
Meg turns around and comes face to face with her dad
A hand enters the tent, startling one of the boys sleeping in it
The clown grabs the boy’s wrist as he approaches
Meg sees a figure move past the screen on the camera footage she is reviewing
Jack touches his mother which causes her to scream
The clown appears in front of Meg
As Jack peeks out of an opening, the clown suddenly appears
A large concrete block moves across the opening
The clown rips through some floor boards causing Jack to scream
The clown suddenly stands up and runs at Meg
The apparently dead clown suddenly grabs Meg around the leg
After Father Simon says “Now,” the camera pans to the left to show Alan being pulled out of a bathtub by someone and screaming
Alan is suddenly shot in the head
The child eater jumps out at the officer Wesley from the corner of the room
Ginger runs at officer Casey from behind and hits him with a shotgun
The child eater suddenly appears in the reflection of the mirror and attacks Ginger
As Lucas walks down a hallway, there is a sudden cut to the child eater, accompanied by a lound sound
Lucas points his flashlight at a corner and the child eater jumps out from behind it
Lucas turns around and the child eater crawls out from behind a corner in front of him
Helen picks up a seemingly dead Ginger’s glass eye, and Ginger grabs her by the arm
Helen kneels down and the child eater is standing right behind her
Uri pretends that something has grabbed his hand in the water
Paul touches a mutated fish and it moves
A bear appears in the hallway and charges at the group
Paul bangs on the van window
Several dogs jump at the van windows
There is a loud bang on the van

As Amanda reaches for the gun, the creature suddenly moves
Something falls down beside Paul
Something breaks the van window
A chair hits a wall and breaks
A distressed Natalie appears around a corner
Amanda shines the torch on a dead guard hanging upside down
A mutated creature jumps out from underneath a blanket. [Video]
A creature attacks Amanda from behind
Amanda is suddenly attacked by a large group of mutated creatures. [Video]
An enraged man comes out of the darkness
A dog barks
The boy on the swing suddenly turns around and lunges at the group
A man snarls behind Clay
Clay opens a door and a woman lunges at him
There is a sudden cut to a horror film on TV in which a screaming woman covered in blood swings a knife towards the camera
A phone suddenly rings
Enid walks into a room to see her mom with her back turned. There is a cut to Enid, and then a sudden cut back to the mom with her screaming at the camera
Aaron is startled by Josef while in his car
Josef surfaces from under the water in the bathtub

Josef wakes up suddenly
There is a noise
Josef starts speaking behind Aaron

While climbing down a cube hatch, Cassandra is suddenly grabbed on the leg
A cup on the table suddenly moves on its own
As Graham reaches for the cup it suddenly flies off the table
The pictures on the wall suddenly fall off on their own
Erin moves to reveal a ghost woman standing right behind her
As the vlogger approaches a hole in a bricked up wall to investigate a noise, a bird suddenly flies out
Erin screams at something and the camera rotates to reveal the ghost woman standing right behind Graham
As the cameraman approaches a doll it suddenly jumps out at him
Graham begins to nudge the sheets on the floor with his foot when the sheets suddenly fly up in the figure of the ghost woman
As Graham approaches a room, the ghost woman becomes visible in the corner, which startles him
Graham slowly moves into the room when the ghost woman suddenly runs out from behind the corner and towards the camera
The ghost woman’s hands suddenly break out of the wall and grab Graham
Graham points the camera at the door which suddenly slams on its own
Graham opens the door to reveal the ghost woman standing right behind it as she lunges out at him
Graham turns around and the ghost woman is right behind him
As Ray clicks through the endlessly scrolling hallway, a ghost suddenly appears on screen
Ray’s camera turns back on and a scary face briefly flashes across the window
Rachel clicks the painting of the forest and it opens a video file, and a scary face immediately flashes in front of the camera in the video
The image of Amy with her face covered immediately shifts to reveal her face is distorted
There is a loud screech and the screen begins to glitch out

The image of Rachel and Amy begins to pop up all over the screen, then all of the images suddenly disappear off the screen to reveal Ray’s face looking very over-exposed and bleeding in front of the camera
A woman dressed in white appears beside Frank’s car window
Laura pokes at a skull on the wall and it falls to the floor, startling her
Brad peeks at the baby and discovers that it is dead
Richard gets out of the car to investigate the baby’s pram on the road, as he looks in he pretends to be pulled into the carriage and eaten
There is a loud noise and the car shakes as a tire blows out
There is a sudden bump as the car hits something
Frank lights a match and the woman in white is standing right behind him
The silhouette of someone appears at the window beside Marion
Marion turns around and runs into the woman in white

Uncle Albert, who is now possessed, suddenly appears behind Brodie
An axe head hits the wall just beside Brodie

There is suddenly a loud bang in the middle of a conversation

While Adam and Dekker are arguing, Will points the camera downwards and a monster runs straight at him
There is suddenly an incredibly loud screech that wakes up Adam and his wife
There is a loud explosion followed by another about 15 seconds later
A gunshot may startle some viewers
There is an explosion and sparks fly from up ahead in the tunnel
Holly screams loudly
There are several more explosions and sparks fly once more
There is an explosion and more sparks as Holly runs through the tunnel
One of the creatures appears in front of the camera
Two creatures appear behind Holly
A creature appears in front of Holly as she approaches J.P
Another creature appears as Holly opens a door
The phone suddenly rings as Jake reaches for it
The car that Dan and his wife are in is suddenly hit by another car
The bin explodes as Emelie opens it
While on the Thunder Mountain rollercoaster, a man’s head hits against a ceiling, becomes decapitated, and flies at the camera
A park guest’s face shifts into a creepy smile accompanied by a sound cue as she walks past the camera
There is a sudden explosion at the Spaceship Earth attraction and it collapses
Mike Myers climbs onto a car roof
A hand reaches through a window to grab lady
A hand smashes through car window
A silhouette watches Laurie walk away from the house
Tommy runs into Myers while at school
Laurie runs into Sheriff Brackett

Myers steps out from a car

Myers pops up from behind a sofa
A loud noise is heard behind him and something briefly flies by the camera

The camera moves to a corpse and the corpse moves its eye
Camera cuts to a dead body
The lights go off and the man sees a dead person appear in front of him
The girl turns the lights off and several dead appear
A hand reaches out from the floor and grabs him
There is suddenly a loud sound as someone creeps through the house

George turns on a light switch, revealing something in the basement that screeches and runs away
As George reaches out for a girl, her hand suddenly reaches out and grabs him
In a “false awakening” jump scare, George wakes up and turns to his side, and the girl suddenly jumps out at him
The car crash suddenly explodes into flames

movies.title: Hell House LLC II: The Abaddon Hotel

jump_scares.spoiler: A woman with pale eyes is seen in a dark basement
The camera pans across to find one of the mannequins sitting at a table is now standing up facing the camera
A bloody woman with pale eyes appears in front of the camera. After holding on the shot for several seconds, the camera zooms in on her eyes
A clown mannequin’s arm and head moves
A door slams shut
A woman with pale eyes blinks, and a female screams
A wall suddenly explodes, revealing a red portal
The camera image glitches with an image of a clown’s face
A bloody girl with yellow eyes and black lips appears in front of the camera
A man playing piano turns to reveal a bloody gash where his eye should be
The camera rounds a corner to see a clown figure standing in the hallway
A scary-looking clown’s head is suddenly looking straight at the camera
A clown figure is seen standing in a doorway at the bottom of stairs
Bedcovers are lifted to reveal a  girl’s bloody face
The camera turns back to reveal scary clown mannequins sitting on the ground
A black figure standing behind a girl suddenly moves towards the camera, while screams are heard
Some viewers might be startled by a loud gunshot as Ann shoots a zombie
A zombie appears in front of Ann as she flees the house
A knock is heard at Seylan’s door, which is revealed to just be a late delivery
Jemma suddenly screams loudly as she claims to have felt something touch her neck

A loud thud is heard
Emma’s drinking glass suddenly shatters

Emma’s cabinet doors burst open
Alan’s body falls to the floor behind Radina
Caroline once again becomes visible through her virtual background as she starts repeatedly slamming her head
Haley’s chair gets pulled away
A mysterious face appears in Teddy’s view
Another mysterious face appears in Teddy’s view as loud screaming is heard
Thudding is heard in the distance
Teddy’s flashlight explodes
A scream is heard as another explosion occurs, blowing Teddy backwards
Emma screams loudly after she throws a blanket and it lands in mid-air
A window shatters off-screen as Jemma breaks into Haley’s house
Jemma’s hand reaches for the camera
Haley’s cabinets and drawers burst open
Hayley appears from under the desk as her chair knocks over
As Haley snaps a portrait, a mysterious and bloodied figure suddenly screams and lunges towards her and Jemma, but is then abruptly cut off due to the Zoom meeting reaching its time limit

movies.title: Hotel Inferno 2: The Cathedral of Pain

The creature in the stove suddenly puts its arm back out

Frank looks up to see a demon right in front of his face
The cultist quickly turns around and attacks Frank

There is another abrupt scene change
A loud scream can be heard

There is an abrupt cut to a man hitting a woman

movies.title: My Heart Can’t Beat Unless You Tell It To
